recipesJson.name: Milky morning
recipesJson.author: Kelgar78
recipesJson.description: A caramel milk with cookies. Excellent for breakfast time with coffee and during day. Enjoy!

reviews.text: A nice mix here, and it does go well with a coffee in the morning. I used VT Vanilla Icecream instead of French Vanilla as I prefer a little less vanilla in mine. I am checking out Kelgar's other mixes too,. Thanks for the recipe.
